trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Vincennes
There were no other sightings in Vincennes on or around July 4th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing on my front porch watching fireworks when i looked over toward the eastern sky and saw one reddish orange "something flying across the sky. i had my husband come outside to see, a neighbor also came out and saw these also. within a minute or 2 another one came flying past. about another minute or so later a third one came. each one flew in the same line as the one before it. i watched each one and after a few minutes of watching they just seemed to fade out. there was no sound, no flashing lights. this is not the first time we've seen these same things. it was the first time i've seen more than one and the first time i've seen them move. usually, they are in the eastern sky, fairly low in the sky, and there is only one that just hovers for maybe 5 minutes or so. then, they just kinda fade out. i've seen the ones that hover on many occassions. i saw the one hovering about a month before this episode. probably see the hovering ones once every couple of months or so. i'm in vincennes, in. and they appear to maybe be over monroe city area.
Summary: three reddish orange objects flew by then each disappeared.
